name: Delivery Delay Probability
definition: Predicted likelihood of a shipment missing its ETA by more than 4 hours using ML forecasting.

calculation_logic.abstract: Count of predicted late shipments / total shipments in active transit
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT COUNT(prediction_id) FILTER (WHERE delay_prob > 0.8) / COUNT(*) FROM ml_inference.delivery_predictions WHERE status = 'IN_TRANSIT'

compliance.ai_risk_level: High Risk (Annex III: Management and operation of critical infrastructure)

name: Driver Fatigue Safety Score
definition: Aggregated score monitoring biometric and behavioral markers for driver exhaustion to ensure transport safety.

calculation_logic.abstract: Weighted average of eyelid closure rate, steering variance, and continuous hours on duty.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT AVG(fatigue_score) FROM raw_iot.telematics_stream GROUP BY driver_id HAVING event_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 HOUR'

name: Last-Mile Carbon Efficiency
definition: Carbon footprint per successful delivery normalized by vehicle type.

calculation_logic.abstract: Total fuel/energy consumed / Total delivered parcels
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT SUM(fuel_consumption * carbon_factor) / COUNT(parcel_id) FROM analytics.delivery_events
